mapper.insert: insert into storememberboard(boardbno, boardtitle, boardcontent, boardip, membernickname,boardfile) values(memberboardseq.nextval, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardIp}, #{memberNickname},#{boardFile})
mapper.select: select boardbno,boardtitle,boardregdate,boardreadcnt,membernickname from storememberboard u, storememberboard b where u.membernickname = b.memmembernickname order boardupdatedate desc
